title: clang compile error: src/cmd/gc/fmt.c:938:11: error: initializer overrides prior initialization of this subobject
body:
by **andelf**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
bash all.bash

2. What is the full compiler output?
/home/wangshuyu/opt/go/src/cmd/gc/fmt.c:938:11: error: initializer overrides prior
initialization of this subobject [-Werror,-Winitializer-overrides]
        [OIND] = 7,
                 ^
/home/wangshuyu/opt/go/src/cmd/gc/fmt.c:924:11: note: previous initialization is here
        [OIND] = 8,
                 ^
1 error generated.
make[1]: *** [fmt.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....


3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
clang version 2.9 (tags/RELEASE_29/final)
Target: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
Thread model: posix
